42 // class ConvexTriangleAABBOverlapCallback
43 class ConvexTriangleAABBOverlapCallback : public DynamicAABBTreeOverlapCallback {
44 
45  private:
46 
47  TriangleCallback& mTriangleTestCallback;
48 
49  // Reference to the concave mesh shape
50  const ConcaveMeshShape& mConcaveMeshShape;
51 
52  // Reference to the Dynamic AABB tree
53  const DynamicAABBTree& mDynamicAABBTree;
54 
55  public:
56 
57  // Constructor
58  ConvexTriangleAABBOverlapCallback(TriangleCallback& triangleCallback, const ConcaveMeshShape& concaveShape,
59  const DynamicAABBTree& dynamicAABBTree)
60  : mTriangleTestCallback(triangleCallback), mConcaveMeshShape(concaveShape), mDynamicAABBTree(dynamicAABBTree) {
61 
62  }
63 
64  // Called when a overlapping node has been found during the call to
65  // DynamicAABBTree:reportAllShapesOverlappingWithAABB()
66  virtual void notifyOverlappingNode(int nodeId) override;
67 
68 };

91  public:
92 
93  // Constructor
94  ConcaveMeshRaycastCallback(const DynamicAABBTree& dynamicAABBTree, const ConcaveMeshShape& concaveMeshShape,
95  ProxyShape* proxyShape, RaycastInfo& raycastInfo, const Ray& ray, MemoryAllocator& allocator)
96  : mHitAABBNodes(allocator), mDynamicAABBTree(dynamicAABBTree), mConcaveMeshShape(concaveMeshShape), mProxyShape(proxyShape),
97  mRaycastInfo(raycastInfo), mRay(ray), mIsHit(false), mAllocator(allocator) {

99  }

122 // Class ConcaveMeshShape
128 class ConcaveMeshShape : public ConcaveShape {
129 
130  protected:
131 
132  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
133 
135  TriangleMesh* mTriangleMesh;
136 
138  DynamicAABBTree mDynamicAABBTree;
139 
142  Vector3** mComputedVerticesNormals;
143 
145  const Vector3 mScaling;
146 
147  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
148 
150  virtual bool raycast(const Ray& ray, RaycastInfo& raycastInfo, ProxyShape* proxyShape, MemoryAllocator& allocator) const override;
151 
153  virtual size_t getSizeInBytes() const override;
154 
156  void initBVHTree();
157 
159  uint computeTriangleShapeId(uint subPart, uint triangleIndex) const;
160 
161  public:
162 
164  ConcaveMeshShape(TriangleMesh* triangleMesh, const Vector3& scaling = Vector3(1, 1, 1));
165 
167  virtual ~ConcaveMeshShape() override = default;
168 
170  ConcaveMeshShape(const ConcaveMeshShape& shape) = delete;
171 
173  ConcaveMeshShape& operator=(const ConcaveMeshShape& shape) = delete;
174 
176  const Vector3& getScaling() const;
177 
179  uint getNbSubparts() const;
180 
182  uint getNbTriangles(uint subPart) const;
183 
185  void getTriangleVerticesIndices(uint subPart, uint triangleIndex, uint* outVerticesIndices) const;
186 
188  void getTriangleVertices(uint subPart, uint triangleIndex, Vector3* outTriangleVertices) const;
189 
191  void getTriangleVerticesNormals(uint subPart, uint triangleIndex, Vector3* outVerticesNormals) const;
192 
194  virtual void getLocalBounds(Vector3& min, Vector3& max) const override;
195 
197  virtual void computeLocalInertiaTensor(Matrix3x3& tensor, decimal mass) const override;
198 
200  virtual void testAllTriangles(TriangleCallback& callback, const AABB& localAABB) const override;
201 
203  virtual std::string to_string() const override;
204 
205 #ifdef IS_PROFILING_ACTIVE
206 
208  virtual void setProfiler(Profiler* profiler) override;
209 
210 #endif
211 
212  // ---------- Friendship ----------- //
213 
214  friend class ConvexTriangleAABBOverlapCallback;
215  friend class ConcaveMeshRaycastCallback;
216 };

218 // Return the number of bytes used by the collision shape
219 inline size_t ConcaveMeshShape::getSizeInBytes() const {
220  return sizeof(ConcaveMeshShape);
221 }
222 
223 // Return the scaling vector
224 inline const Vector3& ConcaveMeshShape::getScaling() const {
225  return mScaling;
226 }
227 
228 // Return the local bounds of the shape in x, y and z directions.
229 // This method is used to compute the AABB of the box
234 inline void ConcaveMeshShape::getLocalBounds(Vector3& min, Vector3& max) const {
235 
236  // Get the AABB of the whole tree
237  AABB treeAABB = mDynamicAABBTree.getRootAABB();
238 
239  min = treeAABB.getMin();
240  max = treeAABB.getMax();
241 }
242 
243 // Return the local inertia tensor of the shape
249 inline void ConcaveMeshShape::computeLocalInertiaTensor(Matrix3x3& tensor, decimal mass) const {
250 
251  // Default inertia tensor
252  // Note that this is not very realistic for a concave triangle mesh.
253  // However, in most cases, it will only be used static bodies and therefore,
254  // the inertia tensor is not used.
255  tensor.setAllValues(mass, 0, 0,
256  0, mass, 0,
257  0, 0, mass);
258 }
259 
260 // Called when a overlapping node has been found during the call to
261 // DynamicAABBTree:reportAllShapesOverlappingWithAABB()
262 inline void ConvexTriangleAABBOverlapCallback::notifyOverlappingNode(int nodeId) {
263 
264  // Get the node data (triangle index and mesh subpart index)
265  int32* data = mDynamicAABBTree.getNodeDataInt(nodeId);
266 
267  // Get the triangle vertices for this node from the concave mesh shape
268  Vector3 trianglePoints[3];
269  mConcaveMeshShape.getTriangleVertices(data[0], data[1], trianglePoints);
270 
271  // Get the vertices normals of the triangle
272  Vector3 verticesNormals[3];
273  mConcaveMeshShape.getTriangleVerticesNormals(data[0], data[1], verticesNormals);
274 
275  // Call the callback to test narrow-phase collision with this triangle
276  mTriangleTestCallback.testTriangle(trianglePoints, verticesNormals, mConcaveMeshShape.computeTriangleShapeId(data[0], data[1]));
277 }
278 
279 #ifdef IS_PROFILING_ACTIVE
280 
281 // Set the profiler
282 inline void ConcaveMeshShape::setProfiler(Profiler* profiler) {
283 
284  CollisionShape::setProfiler(profiler);
285 
286  mDynamicAABBTree.setProfiler(profiler);
287 }
288 
289 
290 #endif
291 
292 }
293 #endif
